readme:
# asteroids-syntax theme

A dark, relaxed syntax theme for Atom, based on soft colours by @edrumm [https://github.com/edrumm](edrumm)

Current version: `Release v1.1.0`

Works best with: C, HTML, CSS, LESS, JS, Java but should work fine with most common languages

## Screenshots

JavaScript:

![js](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45878916/60928091-16101600-a2a4-11e9-9802-f1f2c420fe70.png)

C:

![c](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45878916/60928083-0f819e80-a2a4-11e9-8e8c-ddf21e05da2d.png)

HTML:

![html](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45878916/60928088-13152580-a2a4-11e9-83ba-6bbf1702ccb1.png)

Java:

![java](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/45878916/60928089-14dee900-a2a4-11e9-9304-c46a9c52952b.png)

## Install

`> apm install asteroids-syntax`

Or alternatively:

`Settings` > `Install` > `Themes` > search for `asteroids-syntax`

Cheers! :)
